name: Please, take this off my hands, please
name_original: Please, take this off my hands, please
description:
Move a closet with your neighbour from one apartment to another.
Sounds easy? Think again.

This prototype was made in 16 hours on Scenario Game Jam, May 2022.
https://itch.io/jam/scenario

Programming: Geir Rolandsen
Level design: Kristina Åkerman
Idea & Character Art: Thomas Simonsen Balmbra
Dialogue & Manuscript: Ole-Petter Arneberg

Dialogue will hopefully be implemented soon!
Use both joysticks on a controller, or WASD + arrows.
